column3:
â€œThis strain is such an amazing sleep aid! It makes you feel like you are crawling into a grilled cheese bed of warm gooey cheesy sheets of goodness with toasty bread blankets. Then 9 hours later you awake from what feels like hibernation perfectly rested with zero haziness. 

I am all but non functional within 20 minutes of smoking one bowl so be prepared for bed when you enjoy some Scooby snacks!â€

â€œThis strain made me Throw Up... My arms in the air !!!:)

It's FUCKING GOOD.

If Trump smoked this strain he would stop being a asshole and claim he Invented it!! :Dâ€

â€œI consider myself a VETERAN smoker, I drive, ride bikes, whatevs...but this shit is HEAVY!  Do NOT OPERATE A MOTOR VEHICLE OR HEAVY EQUIPMENT on this medicine!  After all, its hard to drive when you're wrapped in a gooey melted Cheese sandwich. ğŸ˜‚â€

â€œvery good strain nice and relaxing . makes me want to play games all day lol.â€

â€œThis strain will have you acting like Shaggy and talking like Scooby Doo. The mysterious thing is how the hell did it get its name? The nugs I had were small but frosty and pungent. At the time I didn't know that it was a platinum GSC cross but I did take note of the GSC smell it had. The effect was hard hitting at first, but eventually it mellowed out very pleasantly. The taste reminded me of Bubba Kush. The feeling...â€

â€œThese super dank medium-small sized little green clouds are so tasty to smoke; I'd love to vape some if I could. Maybe even roll one up. They taste/feel and smell great! I feel like I could hold my own blazin up with Shaggy. Know what I mean? This strain is everything you want it to be, very versatile.â€

â€œThis is the best strain that I have found to treat my MÃ©niÃ¨reâ€™s disease. After using Scooby snacks for a month the tinnitus in my left ear is significantly lower. I imagine Scooby Snacks would be useful for treating joint pain as well. As for the ...â€

column3: â€œIt's hard and heavy, but smooth. A good wind down strain, but I do not recommend operating a motor vehicle.  Highly recommend.â€

â€œThe pinnacle of my recreational can his hunting thus far in Portland. The first thing that caught my eye was the beautiful fluorescent green matched with abundance of crystal white trichomes. The smell is fruity with a hint of sweet sour diesel. The flower grinded down beautifully and the smoke and flavor was phenomenal. Easy head high with no drowsy come down.â€
â€œOne bowl of this and I was ripped...and I smoke a lot. 10/10 would recommend to anyone and everyone!â€

â€œScooby Snacks is a great strain for relaxing after a stressful day at work! After the first bowl, I was already feeling better. Honestly, I think Leafly has it spot on, in that it brings on stimulating cerebral effects that weigh heavy on your eyes and slowly relax the body". Mine smells good
